articles.description: There are also more skin tone variations for emoji, including couples kissing.
articles.content:
iOS will soon have several new emoji.
Apple's beta release of iOS 14.5 includes a preview of new emoji coming in the spring, including a heart on fire, an exhaling face and more skin tone variations… [+775 chars]

articles.title: Old-School 911 GT3 Vs New-Age McLaren Artura: A Fascinating Clash Of Eras - Car Throttle
articles.description: The 2020s heated up this week with reveals of two polar-opposite supercars, one nudging the combustion era to new heights and the other taking a bold step towards an electrified future. Incredibly, for all their differences, they’re still rivals
articles.content: What a fight we have on our hands. Its the old school versus the new order in what promises to be a titanic scrap that will only even happen in this era, right now. In the blue corner is the champion… [+4826 chars]

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Book Go to feature new Snapdragon 8cx Gen X SoC with 40% faster GPU than the 8cx, will launch alongside the Galaxy Book Pro in May - Notebookcheck.net

articles.content: Samsung will likely release refreshed Galaxy Books in May this year. These include a Galaxy Book Pro powered by 11th gen Intel Tiger Lake CPUs and a Galaxy Book Go, which is said to feature a new Gen… [+2308 chars]
